Review_Text: I watched this to brush up on my German (or in this case, Austrian). If you are even the slightest bit interested in veganism, just google "Dr Gregor" on YouTube. With some organising, this documentary could have been put together from start to finish in less than 2 weeks. Credit where credit is due: they do a good job explaining the "unhealthy vegan", but it's not worth your time.200 more required characters to submit the review... have a good day you reading this, stay off drugs, be nice when possible, enjoy the good weather, stay safe, stay healthy, give yourself a pat on the back sometimes and take it easy!
